item.title: Markdown rendering
item.description:
This is a demo of the basic Markdown rendering.

Bold and italic.

Lists

Unordered

  • Dogs
  • Cats
    • Abyssinian
    • Siamese
  • Cows

Ordered

  1. Build a blog.
    1. Find good static site generator.
    2. Select a theme.
      • Shouldn’t be too complicated.
      • Shouldn’t take too long to setup.
  2. Congrats!

Footnote

Here is a simple footnote1. With some additional text after it.

Table

Column 1 Column 2
Value 1 Value 2

Code

The code can be either inline import discord.py or multiline with the fences:
